short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates the Flesch Reading Ease score of a webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Readability Score Calculator is a browser extension designed to assess the readability of webpages. It calculates the Flesch Reading Ease score of a webpage, providing users with valuable insights into the complexity of written content they encounter online. With this extension, users can make informed decisions about which materials to engage with based on their readability level.
